about_the_game:
Dungeon Coup is a dungeon crawler for adults, filled with bratty doms, horny subs, restraints and lots of sex!

You have been challenged to run through your whole dungeon and back to your throne, however you will have to do so with your hands tied, and your horny subds will take any opportunity to prevent you from completing the challenge.

Will you complete the challenge? or submit to the pleasure?

In this Free Demo you will be able to test the game, however you will only be able to play through the first floor (so you will see a maximum of 12 different sex animations), and won't be able to create your own character or use the unlockable Extra features.
I hope you enjoy this demo!

GAME FEATURES

  • Only see the content you want through gameplay customization options!
  • Choose your preferences: Hetero (M-F / F-M), Lesbian (Yuri), Gay (Yaoi)
  • Play with female, male, femboy or futanari characters!
  • Over 90 different 3D real time, animated sex animations!
  • Resist or Escape from your opponents charms!
  • Create and customize your own characters with over 300 clothing pieces!
  • Additional customization for Clothed sex, Neko mode, Ahegao, and even getting more and more restrained as you get caught!
  • And much more!

content_descriptors.notes: This game features fully animated explicit foreplay and sex animations, light BDSM themes (mostly restraints, domination and submission) and adult language.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7 SP1+, 8, 10, 64-bit versions only
  • Processor: Intel core i3 2.8ghz
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel hd integrated graphics or better

short_description: Run through the sexyest dungeon, filled with rebel minions trying to stop you before you reach your throne room! What 's the catch? your hands are tied, your minions are horny and will try everything to make you fail your challenge! This Free Demo allows players to test the First Floor!
